prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a brilliant young woman, voluminous (natural auburn hair:1.1), elegant oval face, (clear black-framed glasses:1.2), intelligent gaze, laboratory background
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (visible skin imperfections:1.2), natural skin texture, individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching checkered cotton fabric:1.2), (matching white lab coat weave:1.2), sharp focus on glasses frame, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, airbrushed, smooth skin, makeup, lipstick, low quality, (deformed glasses:1.4), (broken glasses:1.2)
